an10.85:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma mahacundo cetisu viharati sahajatiyam.
an10.85:1.2: Tatra kho ayasma mahacundo bhikkhu amantesi:
an10.85:1.4: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahacundassa paccassosum.
an10.85:2.2: ‘aham pathamam jhanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham dutiyam jhanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham tatiyam jhanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham catuttham jhanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham akasanancayatanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham vinnanancayatanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham akincannayatanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham nevasannanasannayatanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham sannavedayitanirodham samapajjamipi vutthahamipi’ti.
an10.85:3.1: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo samanuyunjati samanuggahati samanubhasati.
an10.85:3.2: So tathagatena va tathagatasavakena va jhayina samapattikusalena paracittakusalena paracittapariyayakusalena samanuyunjiyamano samanuggahiyamano samanubhasiyamano irinam apajjati vicinam apajjati anayam apajjati byasanam apajjati anayabyasanam apajjati.
an10.85:4.1: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo evam cetasa ceto paricca manasi karoti:
an10.85:4.2: ‘kim nu kho ayamayasma katthi hoti vikatthi adhigamesu—
an10.85:5.1: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanati:
an10.85:6.1: ‘Digharattam kho ayamayasma khandakari chiddakari sabalakari kammasakari na santatakari na santatavutti silesu.
an10.85:6.3: Dussilyam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.85:7.2: assaddhiyam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.85:8.2: appasaccam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.85:9.2: dovacassata kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.85:10.2: papamittata kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.85:11.2: kosajjam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.85:12.2: mutthassaccam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.85:13.2: kohannam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.85:14.2: dubbharata kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.85:15.2: duppannata kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam’.
an10.85:16.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, sahayako sahayakam evam vadeyya:
an10.85:16.2: ‘yada te, samma, dhanena dhanakaraniyam assa, yaceyyasi mam dhanam. Dassami te dhanan’ti.
an10.85:16.3: So kincideva dhanakaraniye samuppanne sahayako sahayakam evam vadeyya: ‘attho me, samma, dhanena. Dehi me dhanan’ti.
an10.85:16.5: ‘tena hi, samma, idha khanahi’ti. So tatra khananto nadhigaccheyya.
an10.85:16.7: ‘alikam mam, samma, avaca; tucchakam mam, samma, avaca—idha khanahi’ti.
an10.85:16.9: ‘naham tam, samma, alikam avacam, tucchakam avacam. Tena hi, samma, idha khanahi’ti.
an10.85:16.12: ‘alikam mam, samma, avaca, tucchakam mam, samma, avaca—idha khanahi’ti.
an10.85:16.14: ‘naham tam, samma, alikam avacam, tucchakam avacam. Tena hi, samma, idha khanahi’ti.
an10.85:16.17: ‘alikam mam, samma, avaca, tucchakam mam, samma, avaca—idha khanahi’ti.
an10.85:16.19: ‘naham tam, samma, alikam avacam, tucchakam avacam. Api ca ahameva ummadam papunim cetaso vipariyayan’ti.
an10.85:17.1: Evamevam kho, avuso, bhikkhu katthi hoti vikatthi adhigamesu:
an10.85:17.2: ‘aham pathamam jhanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham dutiyam jhanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham tatiyam jhanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham catuttham jhanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham akasanancayatanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham vinnanancayatanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham akincannayatanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham nevasannanasannayatanam samapajjamipi vutthahamipi, aham sannavedayitanirodham samapajjamipi vutthahamipi’ti.

an10.85:18.2: So tathagatena va tathagatasavakena va jhayina samapattikusalena paracittakusalena paracittapariyayakusalena samanuyunjiyamano samanuggahiyamano samanubhasiyamano irinam apajjati vicinam apajjati anayam apajjati byasanam apajjati anayabyasanam apajjati.

an10.85:31.1: So vatavuso, bhikkhu ‘ime dasa dhamme appahaya imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an10.85:31.2: So vatavuso, bhikkhu ‘ime dasa dhamme pahaya imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissati’ti thanametam vijjati”ti.
